definition: to replace sb on a workshift/to substitute for

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc

sentences.english: There is lack of laws and regulations in China for labor dispute treatment during Ding Gang Internship(DGI).
sentences.chinese: 我國缺少頂崗實習期間勞動糾紛處理的法律法規。

sentences.english: The paper mainly researches on total management of post practice.
sentences.chinese: 文章就頂崗實習的全面管理進行了初步探討。

sentences.english: The Paper mainly researches on flexible management of textile speciality.
sentences.chinese: 文章就紡織專業頂崗實習的柔性管理進行了初步探討。
